channel.title: How to Join another's server?
channel.description: well, i can play moparscape, i have no clue how to make my own private server, so i decided to join anothers so i went to advertise your servers here thread and found a lot of servers but how do u join? i have hamachi too >< how do u use hamachi? and wat is like pass:123 O.o :|

item.title: How to Join another's server?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Well, if you ever tried joining a Network you would figure out there is a Network name and a Network Password text area. Thatâ€™s where you put the Password and name into. Then, you just join it. I would suggest just using No-IP though, [i]much[/b] more reliable.

Read full topic
